product_name: O'Neill Santa Cruz Stretch Board Shorts - Men's
long_description: The water-ready O'Neill Santa Cruz Stretch Board Shorts for men are comfortable and stretchy for a day of kayaking, canoeing or stand up paddleboarding. Durable, lightweight fabric is ideal for watersports. Single welt side pocket. O'Neill Santa Cruz Stretch Board Shorts for men feature a traditional lace-up board shorts closure.
short_description: The water-ready O'Neill Santa Cruz Stretch Board Shorts for men are comfortable and stretchy for a day of kayaking, canoeing or stand up paddleboarding.
